Please visit <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-eo.org|ubuntu-eo.org]]</nowiki> in order to visit the Esperanto website of Ubuntu and Ubuntu community.

== Already done ==
** Creation of a website about Ubuntu: <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-eo.org|ubuntu-eo.org]]</nowiki>
** Creation of a wiki about Ubuntu and its community: <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-eo.org/wiki|ubuntu-eo.org/wiki]]</nowiki>
** Creation of Facebook and Launchpad groups in order to organize the work
** Creation of a IRC channel: <nowiki>[[irc:--irc.freenode.net-ubuntu-eo|#ubuntu-eo]]</nowiki>

== Future plans ==
** Organize the translations: not all the people translate correctly
** Add pages to the wiki and change the skin in order to Ubuntu-ize it
** Creation of a team about the spread of Ubuntu in <nowiki>[[https://eo.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esperantio|Esperantio]]</nowiki>
** Creation of a localized version of Ubuntu
** Creation of a Youtube channel in order to add howto and tutorial of Ubuntu
** Creation of a news section in the wiki
** Creation of a Twitter account
